Job Title: Director of Operations | Relocation to Bay Area

Location: Los Angeles Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Manufacturing, Production, Supply Chain

Description:
This role involves leading and coaching staff to excel in various performance metrics while ensuring safety, quality, and efficiency in bakery operations. Responsibilities include setting performance goals, analyzing metrics, overseeing production scheduling, ensuring compliance with regulations, managing finances, fostering customer relations, and developing employees.Client DetailsOur client specializes in premium frozen baked goods. Comprised of renowned bakery brands, its diverse food range encompasses breads, artisanal creations, buns, cookies, donuts, muffins, and pastries.DescriptionLead and guide managers and staff to output_json.title: Director of Operations
output_json.summary: Lead and coach staff to excel in various performance metrics while ensuring safety, quality, and efficiency in bakery operations.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Engineering, Operations Management, or Finance
job_responsibilities: Lead and guide managers and staff to surpass performance metrics across safety, quality, customer service, costs, inventory management, and production.
Establish performance goals encompassing safety, quality, productivity, and cost for facility operations.
Analyze key metrics of bakery operations, generate reports, and formulate recommendations.
Supervise the coordination and scheduling of production to align with sales and marketing demands while meeting service expectations.
Develop and implement policies and procedures to minimize downtime and enhance bakery efficiencies.
Conduct walkthroughs of production areas, identify problem areas, determine causes, and take corrective actions to ensure policy compliance.
Ensure the bakery maintains readiness for inspections at all times.
Oversee adherence to Warehouse FEFO practice, cleanliness, and operational standards.
Establish safety standards and ensure compliance with accident/loss prevention and security policies.
Ensure bakery compliance with local, state, and federal environmental regulations.
Develop and execute financial and non-financial objectives, including annual budgeting, financial forecasts, and operating plans.
Monitor departmental performance to ensure alignment with budgeted operating standards.
Direct customer relations activities to cultivate effective relationships with key customers.
Collaborate with FSQA to manage customer complaints, vendor issues, and ensure product meets customer specifications.
Coordinate the selection, motivation, and development of bakery employees to ensure adequate staffing and future management succession.
Promote positive employee relations and drive enhancements in employee retention and skill development.
